author: Simon Difford
description: Rich berry balanced by citrus and charged with soda to fizz. The egg white ensures a lasting thick foaming head.
name: Merry Widow Fizz
recipeIngredient: 1 Powdered sugar (ground in mortar and pestle) (or use 5ml of 2:1 sugar syrup per spoon)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into chilled glass (no ice)
